ARABIC: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No Messenger came to them without their mocking him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But never once an apostle came to them at whom they did not scoff.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And whenever a Messenger came to them, they never failed to mock him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: No Messenger went to them whom they did not mock.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And never does a Noble Messenger come to them, but they mock at him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And there never came a Messenger to them but that they mocked him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And there never came an apostle to them but they mocked him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and not a single Messenger came to them, but they mocked at him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And never came there unto them a messenger but they did mock him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but there was never a messenger who came to them but they mocked him:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And not an apostle came unto them but at him they were wont to mock.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and there did not come to them any apostle but that they used to deride him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But never came a messenger to them but they mocked him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And never came a Messenger to them but they did mock him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But no Messenger came to them except he was mocked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But no messenger came to them, but they ridiculed him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And no messenger would come to them except that they ridiculed him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:11] And never did a messenger come to them but that they mocked him, in the same way that your people have mocked you — this is meant to comfort the Prophet (s).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And never came there unto them a messenger) who was sent to them (but they did mock him) but they did deride the messenger.
